channel.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
channel.description:
I'm going to start programming a blank Hyperion in a few months, any suggestions? A few things I should/shouldn't do? What I should do to fully get started on it? I've heard it's hard to get used to, but easier than Delta/Pi, or any of that shit.
Any help appreciated. :)

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

eyeownyew:

May I join? :o I would love to work on a blank base, it seems like you would be able to learn a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Keep this bumped please, I need all the suggestions I can get.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Eww, I hate eclipse. I use netbeans.

But, I didn’t mean do you know what packaging is. Like do you know hyperions packaging, like which package handles the world entities, which holds io/nio networking, what holds player/npc entity etc.

As for the runesource project, ill pm you on msn later.[/quote]

I use both depending what mood I’m in

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Blakeman told me RuneSource and Hyperion are very similar; especially in forms of stability.

May I join? :o I would love to work on a blank base, it seems like you would be able to learn a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Eww, I hate eclipse. I use netbeans.

But, I didn’t mean do you know what packaging is. Like do you know hyperions packaging, like which package handles the world entities, which holds io/nio networking, what holds player/npc entity etc.

As for the runesource project, ill pm you on msn later.[/quote]

Alright, I’ll just talk to you on msn, and I’ll download Hyperion to try and get used to it.

item.title: Hyperion (Experienced Members Only)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Or you could do RuneSource with me.

Anywho, do you know how to use an IDE?
Do you know basic stuff on Hyperion, such as the packaging? If not, learn it.[/quote]

I would do RuneSource :), and I have eclipse with no idea how to use it, I know what packaging is. Is there an tutorial where I can learn how to do these things?

Read full topic
